profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.5.3 Annotation dictionaries - Transparency
profile.description: An annotation dictionary shall not contain the CA key with a value other than 1.0
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: An annotation dictionary shall not contain the CA key with a value other than 1.0

error.message: An annotation dictionary contains the CA key with value other than 1.0
